## ðŸ’¡ About

**Perplexity Omnibox** is a lightweight, easy-to-use extension that fetches AI search results from perplexity.ai.

- **Easy to use â€”** Just type `@perplexity` in address bar + query
- **Super lightweight â€”** < 100 KB
- **Multi-browser support â€”** All Chromium browsers supported (e.g. Chrome, Edge, Opera)
- **Privacy focused â€”** No personal data collected
